entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
